package.sms: Какой-то длинный текст более чем на 70 символов, и тут должна вернуться ошибка, типа часть длинная слишком
Lead to the river Midsummer, I waved A 'V' of black swans On with hope to the grave All through Red September With skies fire-paved I begged you ap

pear Like a thorn for the holy ones
Cold was my soul Untold was the pain I faced when you left me A rose in the rain So I swore to thy razor That never, enchained
